title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 4.20 - 21/11/2014
body:
Summoners,

On 21/11/2014, starting at 02:30 AM AEDT, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 4.20. At 04:00 AM AEDT, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. 

The patch will be approximately 221MB

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.

-ToxicHawk

replies.body: Ready to instability Kalista... Just got 7800 ip last night. :P

Been looking forward to this, I know what I am doing tomorrow.

 {{summoner:11}}{{item:1039}}
Thanks for the heads up ToxicHawk!
I'm excited for Kalista to be released!

Riot, do you like my poem?

Da Da Da Da Da

We're preparing for patch four twen ty

Da Da Da Da Da

It's the greatest patch in hiss tor y

Play League everyday
